channel.title: Binary on Lucas Xu
channel.description: Recent content in Binary on Lucas Xu

item.title: Digital Logic
item.description: Computer language Computer ( or say, CPU in computer) computes using 0s and 1s at a really fast rate. In other words, it uses a Binary System. (base-2 numeral system) In computer term, we group binary into 8 numbers or bits. Technically, a bit is a binary digit. Historically, we used 8 bits because in the early days of computing, hardware utilized the base-2 numeral system to move bits around.
